text: 3.2 Jud 17 Bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok takaw kɨli bɨlel agñɨlak ak nɨŋɨd, gos anɨb ak nɨgɨlɨg yenɨmɨb agɨl gos nepin. Pen Bɨawl ak, ne bɨ kasɨn gep chɨn mɨdeb ak, takaw kɨles ne ak abe nɨŋɨd, gos anɨb ak nɨgɨlɨg yenɨmɨb agɨl gos nepin. Takaw anɨb ak, bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb okok kɨli nɨbop agñɨlak.
